hero.headlineFourth: you need to know about us
hero.videoNote: Tired of reading? Hit play and learn why the Crypterium App is the best cryptocurrency wallet ever

buy.title: easiest and fastest way to
buy.subTitle: Buying cryptocurrencies used to be a painful experience. Not anymore. With Crypterium, purchase digital currencies with a few taps. We keep your card details safe and charge the lowest fees
buy.rangeSubheading: Enter the crypto world holder with just €10 or go all-in with our monthly limit of €10,000
buy.range2Subheading: Buy cryptocurrencies with any Visa and MasterCard
buy.range3Subheading: Your digital assets are instantly credited to your Crypterium Wallet and ready to be used!
buy.videoSubheading: It's never late to learn something awesome. Watch this video or read our tutorial to find out why this feature rocks!

send.title: anywhere for free
send.subTitle: All you need is the recipient’s phone number. They get the money even they don’t have the app yet. No fees. No waiting. No limits
send.sendMessage: You received 1000 USDC in Crypterium App. Download the App via following link
send.heading: how it
send.subheading: Say good-bye to wallet addresses. Select the currency, amount and a contact from your phone book or enter a new number
send.headingSecondSubheading: Enter the details and figure out how much you can save by sending money with Crypterium compared to other remittance services on the market
send.videoNote: It's never late to learn something awesome. Watch this video or read our tutorial to find out why this feature rocks!

cashout.title: anytime, instantly
cashout.subTitle: Stop waiting for what is yours. Whenever you need extra cash, use Crypterium to send crypto straight to your bank card in seconds
cashout.itemFirstSubheading: Access your money in seconds regardless of where you are
cashout.videoNote: It's never late to learn something awesome. Watch this video or read our tutorial to find out why this feature rocks!

exchange.subTitle: Looking for best exchange rates? You’ve come to the right place. We’ve integrated with Top exchanges to always get you the best deal
exchange.headingFirstSubheading: Our bid-ask matching system powered by artificial intelligence monitors all exchange rates and picks the best one for each of your transactions
exchange.videoNote: It's never late to learn something awesome. Watch this video or read our tutorial to find out why this feature rocks!

store.title: securely
store.subTitle: A lifetime-free wallet that keeps your digital currencies safe and always ready to use
store.headingFirstSubheading: Access your Bitcoin, Ethereum and other cryptocurrencies wherever you are, whenever you need them
store.slider2Subheading: Never worry again about your crypto. All funds stored in the Crypterium App are fully insured against cyber-attacks
store.slider3Subheading: Your wallet is protected by BitGo - the world’s most secure and compliant cryptocurrency custody solution
store.videoNote: It's never late to learn something awesome. Watch this video or read our tutorial to find out why this feature rocks!

card.title: first and only
card.subTitle: Manage your card directly in the Crypterium App—check your payment history, top the card, change your PIN, and more! All in one place
card.slidernote: Manage your card directly in the Crypterium App—check your payment history, top the card, change your PIN, and more! All in one place
